name: Garmin GPSMAP 65S - Unisex
description: Whether you find yourself in canyons of glass and steel, or granite and conifers, this multiband GPS knows exactly where you are. Updated with multiband GNSS technology, for more satellites and faster signals.Multiband signal reception and expanded GNSS support (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS and IRNSS) provide faster and more accurate positioning and elevation data.Preloaded with routable TopoActive maps (Canada and US 100K resolution), featuring streets and trails, making front-country or backcountry navigation a lot easier.Point of interest navigation lets you search for places you may want to go, e.g restaurants, attractions, accommodation, etc.Tilt-compensated 3-axis electronic compass shows your heading even when you're stationary, so you're always facing the right direction.Barometric altimeter helps you track your ascents, descents and total elevation changes.LiveTrack™ during activities (through a connected phone) to share your location, speed and more with friends, family or followers.Bluetooth Smart and ANT+ compatibility lets you explore smarter with compatible activity sensors and accessories.Garmin Explore™ website and app let you sync routes, tracks and waypoints to your device. You can download map data to your phone, use your phone to plan routes and tracks, and then send those plans to your GPS, all without cell reception.Free Garmin Connect™ mobile app allows you to customize your GPS experience, reviewing stored activity data, selecting which apps can push notifications, loading and synching geocaching data and more.Share your favourite hikes, fishing holes and view points wirelessly with other compatible devices.Paperless geocaching compatible, download GPX files from your favourite geocaching site right to your device.2 AA batteries run for 16 hours. And, as the AA is the world’s most common battery it is easy to keep your GPS up and running nearly anywhere.Large 6.6cm screen is bright and clear making it easy to read in all conditions, even direct sun.16GB of internal memory can be increased via a MicroSD cards – up to 32GB cards (not included).IPX7 waterproofing protects your 64-series from even the heaviest downpours.In the box: GPSMAP 65S, USB cable, carabiner clip and documentation.
